title: Delphi Complete Works of Jerome K. Jerome (Illustrated)
description:

For the first time in publishing history, this comprehensive eBook presents the complete works of Jerome K. Jerome, with numerous illustrations, rare texts, informative introductions and the usual Delphi bonus material.
